mapper.update: update discount_codes set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount_type = #{discountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount_value = #{discountValue,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, max_redemptions = #{maxRedemptions,jdbcType=INTEGER}, redeemed_count = #{redeemedCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, valid_from = #{validFrom,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, valid_to = #{validTo,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where discount_code_id = #{discountCodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select discount_code_id, company_id, code, description, discount_type, discount_value, max_redemptions, redeemed_count, valid_from, valid_to, status, created_at from discount_codes where discount_code_id = #{discountCodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select discount_code_id, company_id, code, description, discount_type, discount_value, max_redemptions, redeemed_count, valid_from, valid_to, status, created_at from discount_codes
